Title: Establishes the office of the HDFC cooperative ombudsman
Summary: Establishes the office of the HDFC cooperative ombudsman; establishes an office of the HDFC ombudsman fund for deposit of a residential unit fee, and directs the administration of such fund.
LawCode: Add Art 5-A §§80 - 80-i, Exec L; add §186-h, Tax L; add §80-a, amd §80, St Fin L; amd §352-e, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing the office of the HDFC cooperative ombudsman; and to amend the tax law, the state finance law, and the general business law, in relation to establishment of a fund for deposit of a residential unit fee, and to direct the administration of such fund
